sect3.title: Program Files
sect3.para: chvt, deallocvt, dumpkeys, fgconsole, getkeycodes, getunimap, kbd_mode, kbdrate, loadkeys, loadunimap, mapscrn, openvt, psfaddtable (link to psfxtable), psfgettable (link to psfxtable), psfstriptable (link to psfxtable), psfxtable, resizecons, setfont, setkeycodes, setleds, setlogcons, setmetamode, setvesablank, showfont, showkey, unicode_start, and unicode_stop

sect4.title: chvt
sect4.para: chvt changes foreground virtual terminal.

sect4.title: deallocvt
sect4.para: deallocvt deallocates unused virtual terminals.

sect4.title: dumpkeys
sect4.para: dumpkeys dumps keyboard translation tables.

sect4.title: fgconsole
sect4.para: fgconsole prints the number of the active virtual terminal.

sect4.title: getkeycodes
sect4.para: getkeycodes prints the kernel scancode-to-keycode mapping table.

sect4.title: getunimap
sect4.para: getunimap prints the currently used unimap.

sect4.title: kbd_mode
sect4.para: kbd_mode reports or sets the keyboard mode.

sect4.title: kbdrate
sect4.para: kbdrate sets the keyboard repeat and delay rates.

sect4.title: loadkeys
sect4.para: loadkeys loads keyboard translation tables.

sect4.title: loadunimap
sect4.para: loadunimap loads the kernel unicode-to-font mapping table.

sect4.title: mapscrn
sect4.para: mapscrn loads a user defined output character mapping table into the console driver. Note that it is obsolete and that its features are built into setfont.

sect4.title: openvt
sect4.para: openvt starts a program on a new virtual terminal (VT).

sect4.title: psfaddtable, psfgettable, psfstriptable, psfxtable
sect4.para: These are a set of tools for handling Unicode character tables for console fonts.

sect4.title: resizecons
sect4.para: resizecons changes the kernel idea of the console size.

sect4.title: setfont
sect4.para: This lets you change the EGA/VGA fonts in console.

sect4.title: setkeycodes
sect4.para: setkeycodes loads kernel scancode-to-keycode mapping table entries.

sect4.title: setleds
sect4.para: setleds sets the keyboard LEDs. Many people find it useful to have numlock enabled by default and, by using this program, you can achieve this.

sect4.title: setlogcons
sect4.para: setlogcons sends kernel messages to the console.

sect4.title: setmetamode
sect4.para: setmetamode defines the keyboard meta key handling.

sect4.title: setvesablank
sect4.para: This lets you fiddle with the built-in hardware screensaver (not toasters, only a blank screen).

sect4.title: showfont
sect4.para: showfont displays data about a font. The information shown includes font information, font properties, character metrics and character bitmaps.

sect4.title: showkey
sect4.para: showkey examines the scancodes and keycodes sent by the keyboard.

sect4.title: unicode_start
sect4.para: unicode_start puts the console in Unicode mode.

sect4.title: unicode_stop
sect4.para: unicode_stop reverts keyboard and console from unicode mode.
